data.name: The Packages
data.detailed_description:
A puzzle game with great challenges and enjoyable environment. Simple and intuitive with easy interactions.

The mechanics and gameplay are very simple, You just need to complete all the request to finish th level. Try collect all 3 stars, but of couse it's not easy ;)

Click to change direction or Click+Drag to set direction


Remember, you need to complete all requests to level up.


  • 50 Levels
  • 10 Package colors
  • 17 Steam Achievements
  • Minimalist game concept
  • Relaxing experience
  • Beautiful 3D graphics
  • Simple and intuitive interface
  • Easy interactions
  • Great challenges
  • Quality adjustments

Thanks for supporting.
I hope you like it and thank you for playing!

data.short_description: A puzzle game with great challenges and enjoyable environment. Simple and intuitive with easy interactions.
data.supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse are required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse are required
